channel.title: Null Pointers

item.title: Null Pointers
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Hi MoparScape, I have been attempting at re-writing Fishing, I am using an enum and it is giving me the dreaded null pointersâ€¦ I was wondering if someone could find what I should do?
Here is my enum and fishing void.

	public static enum Fishes {
		Shrimp(317, 1, 5, "Raw Shrimp", 303), /*Trout(335, 20, 25, "Raw Trout"),*/ Tuna(359, 30, 35, "Raw Tuna", 311),
		Lobster(377, 40, 50, "Raw Lobster", 301), Monkfish(7944, 62, 70, "Raw Monkfish", 311), 
		Shark(383, 76, 75, "Raw Shark", 311)/*, Manta(389, 81, 50, "Raw Manta Ray")*/;
		
	
	
		int fishID, lvlR, XP, Tool;
		String fishName;
	
		Fishes(final int fishID, final int lvlR, final int XP,
		final String fishName, final int Tool) {
			this.fishID = fishID;
			this.lvlR = lvlR;
			this.XP = XP;
			this.fishName = fishName;
			this.Tool = Tool;
			
		}
		
		int getID() {
			return this.fishID;
		}
		
		int getR(){
			return this.lvlR;
		}
		
		int getXP() {
			return this.XP;
		}
		
		String getName() {
			return this.fishName;
		}
		
		 int getTool() {
			return this.Tool;
		}
	}
	
	
	
		public void startFish() {
		if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(f.getTool())) {
			if (c.playerLevel[10] >= f.getR()) {
				if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) {
						c.sendMessage("You catch a fish!");
						c.getItems().addItem(f.getID(), 1);
					
				}
			}
			
		}
	}
